item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-01-30
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: The 19 most complex and dangerous roads in the world /via @raduboncea #
  • RT: "Obama Still Loved By Over-Educated" or as we like to call ourselves, "People who read books." /via @JKMyth #
  • Huffpost - Obama Goes To GOP Lions' Den -- And Mauls The Lions #
  • Ah Internet Explorer your consistent lousiness is like a warm cup of coffee in the morning...splashed in my face. #
  • RT: Find books, series, and authors easier with our new type-ahead search box! (via @fictfact) #
  • I'm at Genki Ya (398 Harvard Street, Brookline). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
